manifest.ext.name: URLs-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero Hassle URL Extraction from Documentation, Configs, and Code
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract URLs
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: URLs-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy extraction results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: Enable automatic deduplication of extracted URLs
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: Open post-processed content in a new editor
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn before opening multiple result documents when count exceeds this threshold
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show parse errors as VS Code notifications when parsing fails
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show URLs-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
runtime.error.open-side-by-side-failed: Failed to open results side by side: {0}
runtime.error.open-new-file-failed: Failed to open results in new file: {0}
runtime.error.apply-edits-failed: Failed to apply edits to document
runtime.error.parse.suggestion: Check the URL format and ensure values are valid
runtime.error.file-system.suggestion: Check file permissions and ensure the file exists
runtime.error.configuration.suggestion: Reset to default settings or check configuration syntax
runtime.error.validation.suggestion: Review URL values and ensure they meet validation criteria
runtime.error.safety.suggestion: Reduce file size or adjust safety thresholds
runtime.error.operational.suggestion: Try again or check system resources
runtime.error.unknown.suggestion: Check the logs for more details and consider reporting this issue
runtime.info.no-urls-found: No URLs found in the current document
runtime.info.urls-extracted-with-clipboa: Extracted {0} URLs and copied to clipboard
runtime.warning.clipboard-too-large: Results too large for clipboard ({0} bytes), skipping clipboard copy
runtime.warning.clipboard-access-denied: Clipboard access denied. Extracted URLs but could not copy to clipboard.
